title: Champion IP pricing reduction
body:
Hey everyone,

I was thinking it was quite a while ago that the champions received a reduction in IP cost. Is this something that may be happening again soon? Would love a response from a Red or someone that has been here from the beginning that may know of a trend with the timing of this sort of thing?

Cheers =D

replies.body:
They happen everytime a new champion is released. it wasn't actually that long ago since it happened, with Illaio, {{champion:120}}  got changed down to 4800 ip and {{champion:33}} to 1350 ip... That was about 2 weeks ago! 
Usually, there is only one price reduction when a new champ is released, but on rare occasions, there are two. 

The next few champs to get there price reduced are...
Varus - 6300ip to 4800ip
Darius - 6300ip to 4800ip
Draven + a champion lower then 4800 - 6300ip to 4800ip, ? 
Jayce - 6300ip to 4800ip 
and so on...

These are just some confirmed IP reduction changes ready for a new champion to be released! P.S, No, champion reworks do not count...

Thanks!

Hey Rouguestoney,

You might find this useful, you can find a full schedule in the link too. - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction
> 
> PRICE REDUCTION SCHEDULE
> Every time a new champion is released, the oldest 6300 IP/975 RP champion will be reduced to 4800 IP/880 RP.
> 
> Also, with every third champion release, an additional champion currently priced at 4800 IP or lower will be reduced to the next lowest tier, based on age and ease of play.
> 
> Because these price reductions are pre-announced, we will not be granting pro-active refunds to players that purchase these champions prior to their reductions.
does champion updates such as poppy/sion count as new champ releases?
I'm not 100% sure, I guess we will find out when poppy comes out. But I dont believe so.
poppy and sion arent new champions. poppy and sion exist in the game in this very moment. i know, its hard to believe

It only takes the most basic level of understanding of english language to understand that what i asked relies on that as staple fact, so if you lack the ability to comprehend the purpose of my question and pick up on the subtle implications represented therein, i would advise not looking a fool by commenting on matters you haven't fully understood.
i know you're angry since finding out they've already been in the game but you should probably calm down, take a few deep breaths, and sit the fuck down
well i cant argue with stupidity, well done.
The rule is that all new champions go to 7800 IP, so unless for some strange reason Poppy goes to 7800 IP on release, she will not be considered a new champion.
